name: The Ghost of The Galaxy Sky
name_original: The Ghost of The Galaxy Sky
description:
Revamp version of my 2d shooter ver 1 and Unity Coursera 2d shooter. It added several modification such as :

1. Story mode
Play as the ghost of the galaxy sky and immerse yourself through the story. The story have 5 chapters and 1 hidden chapter.
2. High score mode
If you dont want to play story mode and just want to shoot everything and everyone, play highscore mode and see how good you are
3. Boss fight
I added 3 bosses for you to fight againts in story mode and highscore mode. Embrace yourself because its very hard.
4. Minimap
Minimap so you can see how many enemies nearby and how close they are
5. New BM music
I added several music so you can feel the intensity of playing the game.
6. Dialogue
To compliment and explain what happened in the story mode, i added basic dialogue feature you can understand what is happening.
